hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
### This will check if all downloads are ready. ### - will fail if not ready. Will not proceed to next job. ### - will proceed with next job if ready php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_Netherlands"}' php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_France"}' php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_Germany"}' php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_Brazil"}' php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_Sweden"}' php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN", "taxon":"GBIF_UnitedKingdom"}'
